recipes.name: Classic Margherita Pizza
recipes.description: A traditional Italian pizza with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil
instructions: Preheat oven to 475°F (245°C)
Roll out pizza dough on floured surface
Transfer to pizza stone or baking sheet
Spread sauce evenly over dough
Add mozzarella and tomato slices
Drizzle with olive oil and season
Bake for 12-15 minutes until golden
Top with fresh basil before serving
recipes.author: Chef Marco

recipes.name: Chicken Teriyaki Bowl
recipes.description: Tender chicken glazed in homemade teriyaki sauce served over rice
instructions: Cook rice according to package directions
Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces
Mix soy sauce, honey, vinegar, ginger, and garlic
Heat oil in large skillet over medium-high heat
Cook chicken until golden brown, 6-8 minutes
Add sauce mixture and simmer 3-4 minutes
Mix cornstarch with 2 tbsp water, add to thicken
Serve over rice, garnish with green onions and sesame seeds
recipes.author: Chef Yuki

recipes.name: Avocado Toast with Poached Egg
recipes.description: Creamy avocado on toasted bread topped with a perfectly poached egg
instructions: Toast bread slices until golden brown
Bring water to gentle simmer, add vinegar
Crack eggs into small bowls
Create whirlpool in water, gently add eggs
Poach for 3-4 minutes until whites are set
Mash avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper
Spread avocado on toast
Top with poached egg and seasonings
recipes.author: Chef Sarah

recipes.name: Beef Tacos with Cilantro Lime Crema
recipes.description: Seasoned ground beef tacos with fresh toppings and creamy cilantro lime sauce
instructions: Heat oil in large skillet over medium heat
Cook onion until softened, about 5 minutes
Add garlic, cook 1 minute more
Add ground beef, cook until browned
Season with chili powder, cumin, salt, and pepper
Mix sour cream, cilantro, and lime juice for crema
Warm tortillas in dry skillet or microwave
Assemble tacos with beef, lettuce, cheese, tomatoes, and crema
recipes.author: Chef Carlos

recipes.name: Mediterranean Quinoa Salad
recipes.description: Fresh and healthy quinoa salad with Mediterranean flavors
instructions: Rinse quinoa under cold water
Bring broth to boil, add quinoa
Reduce heat, simmer covered 15 minutes
Let quinoa cool completely
Combine cucumber, tomatoes, onion, and olives
Whisk olive oil, lemon juice, and oregano
Toss quinoa with vegetables and dressing
Top with feta and parsley before serving
recipes.author: Chef Elena

recipes.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.description: Classic homemade chocolate chip cookies that are crispy on the outside and chewy inside
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C)
Mix flour, baking soda, and salt in bowl
Cream butter and both sugars until fluffy
Beat in eggs and vanilla
Gradually mix in flour mixture
Stir in chocolate chips
Drop rounded tablespoons on ungreased baking sheets
Bake 9-11 minutes until golden brown
recipes.author: Chef Betty

recipes.name: Thai Green Curry
recipes.description: Aromatic and spicy Thai green curry with vegetables and coconut milk
instructions: Cook rice according to package directions
Heat oil in large pan over medium heat
Fry curry paste for 1-2 minutes until fragrant
Add thick part of coconut milk, stir well
Add chicken, cook until no longer pink
Add vegetables and remaining coconut milk
Season with fish sauce and brown sugar
Simmer 10-15 minutes until vegetables are tender
Garnish with Thai basil and serve over rice
recipes.author: Chef Siriporn

recipes.name: French Onion Soup
recipes.description: Classic French onion soup with caramelized onions and melted Gruyère cheese
instructions: Melt butter in large pot over medium heat
Add onions and sugar, cook stirring occasionally
Caramelize onions for 45-50 minutes until deep brown
Add wine, scraping up browned bits
Add broth, bay leaves, and thyme
Simmer 20 minutes, season with salt and pepper
Preheat broiler, toast bread slices
Ladle soup into oven-safe bowls
Top with bread and cheese, broil until bubbly
recipes.author: Chef Pierre

recipes.name: Vegetable Stir Fry
recipes.description: Quick and healthy vegetable stir fry with ginger soy sauce
instructions: Heat oil in large wok or skillet over high heat
Add bell pepper and broccoli, stir-fry 2 minutes
Add carrot and snap peas, stir-fry 2 minutes more
Add garlic and ginger, stir-fry 30 seconds
Mix soy sauce, sesame oil, and cornstarch
Add sauce to vegetables, toss to coat
Cook 1-2 minutes until sauce thickens
Garnish with green onions, serve over rice
recipes.author: Chef Lin

recipes.name: Banana Pancakes
recipes.description: Fluffy pancakes with mashed banana for natural sweetness
instructions: Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt in large bowl
Whisk milk, egg, melted butter, and vanilla in another bowl
Add mashed bananas to wet ingredients
Pour wet ingredients into dry ingredients, mix until just combined
Heat griddle or large skillet over medium heat
Brush with butter
Pour 1/4 cup batter for each pancake
Cook until bubbles form on surface, flip and cook until golden
Serve hot with maple syrup
recipes.author: Chef Anna

recipes.name: Caesar Salad
recipes.description: Classic Caesar salad with homemade dressing and croutons
instructions: Make croutons: sauté bread cubes in butter until golden
Mash anchovies and garlic into paste
Whisk in lemon juice, mustard, and egg yolk
Slowly drizzle in olive oil while whisking
Season dressing with salt and pepper
Toss lettuce with dressing
Top with Parmesan and croutons
Serve immediately
recipes.author: Chef Julius

recipes.name: Mushroom Risotto
recipes.description: Creamy Italian risotto with mixed mushrooms and Parmesan
instructions: Heat oil in large pan, sauté mushrooms until golden
Remove mushrooms, set aside
Add butter to pan, sauté onion until soft
Add garlic, cook 1 minute
Add rice, stir to coat with butter
Add wine, stir until absorbed
Add warm broth one ladle at a time, stirring constantly
Continue until rice is creamy and tender, about 20 minutes
Stir in mushrooms, Parmesan, and parsley
recipes.author: Chef Giuseppe

recipes.name: Fish Tacos with Mango Salsa
recipes.description: Grilled fish tacos topped with fresh mango salsa and cabbage slaw
instructions: Season fish with chili powder, cumin, salt, and pepper
Heat oil in grill pan over medium-high heat
Cook fish 3-4 minutes per side until flaky
Mix mango, onion, jalapeño, half the lime juice, and cilantro
Toss cabbage with remaining lime juice
Warm tortillas in dry skillet
Flake fish into chunks
Assemble tacos with fish, cabbage, and mango salsa
recipes.author: Chef Rosa

recipes.name: Lemon Bars
recipes.description: Tangy lemon bars with buttery shortbread crust and powdered sugar
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C)
Mix 2 cups flour and 1/2 cup powdered sugar
Cut in cold butter until mixture resembles coarse crumbs
Press into greased 9x13 inch pan
Bake crust 20 minutes until lightly golden
Beat eggs, granulated sugar, 1/4 cup flour, lemon juice, zest, and salt
Pour over hot crust
Bake 20-25 minutes until set
Cool completely, dust with powdered sugar before cutting
recipes.author: Chef Lily

recipes.name: Chicken Curry
recipes.description: Aromatic Indian-style chicken curry with warm spices and coconut milk
ingredients: 2 lbs chicken thighs, cut into chunks
instructions: Cook rice according to package directions
Heat oil in large pot over medium heat
Cook onion until softened, about 5 minutes
Add garlic and ginger, cook 1 minute
Add curry powder, turmeric, and cumin, cook 30 seconds
Add chicken, cook until browned on all sides
Add coconut milk and tomatoes
Simmer 25-30 minutes until chicken is tender
Season with salt, garnish with cilantro
Serve over rice
recipes.author: Chef Priya

recipes.name: Greek Salad
recipes.description: Fresh Mediterranean salad with tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, and feta
instructions: Arrange tomatoes, cucumber, and onion on large platter
Scatter olives and feta over vegetables
Whisk olive oil, vinegar, and oregano
Drizzle dressing over salad
Season with salt and pepper
Garnish with fresh parsley
Let stand 10 minutes before serving
Serve at room temperature
recipes.author: Chef Dimitri

recipes.name: Beef Stir Fry
recipes.description: Quick and flavorful beef stir fry with vegetables in savory sauce
instructions: Marinate beef in 2 tbsp soy sauce and cornstarch
Heat oil in large wok over high heat
Stir-fry beef until browned, remove from pan
Add vegetables to pan, stir-fry 3-4 minutes
Add garlic and ginger, stir-fry 30 seconds
Return beef to pan
Add remaining soy sauce and oyster sauce
Stir-fry 1-2 minutes until heated through
Serve over rice, garnish with green onions
recipes.author: Chef Wang

recipes.name: Blueberry Muffins
recipes.description: Tender, fluffy muffins bursting with fresh blueberries
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)
Line muffin tin with paper liners
Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt in large bowl
Whisk oil, egg, milk, and vanilla in another bowl
Pour wet ingredients into dry ingredients, mix until just combined
Toss blueberries with 1 tbsp flour
Fold blueberries into batter gently
Fill muffin cups 2/3 full with batter
Bake 20-25 minutes until golden brown
Cool in pan 5 minutes before removing
recipes.author: Chef Martha
